com.radirius.mercury.scene

Class BasicEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.mercury.scene.GameObject
      • com.radirius.mercury.scene.BasicEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cleanable, Entity, Initializable, Renderable, Updatable, Wipeable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShapedEntity

    public class BasicEntity
extends GameObject
    A base for all Entities that have a function in a Mercury game's environment.
    Author:
    Jeviny
